item.title: 亚马逊预计利润因贸易担忧不及预期
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）对本季度营业利润的预测低于预期，指出关税和贸易政策可能导致消费者减少支出。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. gave a weaker-than-expected forecast for operating profit in the current quarter, pointing toward tariffs and trade policies that may cause consumers to pull back on spending.】

item.title: 支付公司下调盈利预期后，布洛克股票下跌
item.description: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）领导的数字支付公司布洛克公司（Block Inc.【原文：Block Inc., the digital-payments company led by Jack Dorsey, posted first-quarter results below analysts’ estimates and lowered its full-year profit guidance as a result of a more challenging macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: Reddit 公布收入超过分析师预期后大涨
item.description: Reddit 公司表示，本季度营收将好于预期，这表明经济下滑尚未影响数字广告业的发展，Reddit 公司股价随之大涨。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares jumped after it said revenue in the current quarter will be better than estimates, a sign that a broader dip in the economy hasn’t yet dented the digital advertising industry.】

item.title: Instacart 订单增长创 2022 年以来新高，前景一片光明
item.description: Instacart 公布了自 2022 年以来第一季度最强劲的订单增长，并预计当期盈利将好于预期，这表明其核心配送业务和不断增长的杂货软件和广告部门具有恢复力。【原文：Instacart posted its strongest order growth since 2022 for the first quarter and projected better-than-expected earnings for the current period, a sign of resilience in its core delivery business and growing grocery software and advertising unit.】

item.title: Airbnb 以美国旅游需求疲软为由展望未来
item.description: Airbnb Inc.发布的第二季度业绩展望疲软，继在线旅游同行Booking Holdings Inc.之后，将美国旅游需求疲软归咎于经济不确定性。【原文：Airbnb Inc. issued a weak outlook for the second quarter, following online travel peer Booking Holdings Inc. in blaming economic uncertainties for softer travel demand in the US.】

item.title: 60 分钟 "将播出特朗普针对律师事务所的报道
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普总统批评《60 分钟》的批评性报道太多之后不到三周，该新闻杂志宣布计划播出一篇关于他通过行政命令打击律师事务所的报道。【原文：Less than three weeks after President Donald Trump criticized 60 Minutes for what he said were too many critical stories, the newsmagazine announced plans to air a piece about his efforts to target law firms through executive orders.】

item.title: 人工智能推动顶级用户数量增长，Duolingo 前景看好
item.description: Duolingo Inc.上调了全年销售额和利润展望，原因是人工智能产品促使用户购买其价格更高的订阅服务。【原文：Duolingo Inc. raised its full-year sales and profit outlook as artificial intelligence offerings are driving users to its higher-priced subscriptions.】

item.title: 人工智能聊天机器人说出你想听的话的危险
item.description: OpenAI 正在采取措施，让 ChatGPT 不再那么谄媚，尽管这个问题可能很难彻底解决。但首先...【原文：OpenAI is taking steps to make ChatGPT less sycophantic, though the problem may be tough to solve completely. But first...】

item.title: AQR长短仓策略四月收益将2025年回报率提升至12.1
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）的德尔福股票多空策略（Delphi Long-Short Equity Strategy）在第一季度的表现优于许多其他以股票为重点的对冲基金，4 月份跃升 3.2%。【原文：AQR Capital Management’s Delphi Long-Short Equity Strategy jumped 3.2% in April, after outperforming many other stock-focused hedge funds in the first quarter.】

item.title: 比特币突破 10 周高点后逼近 100,000 美元
item.description: 比特币在达到 2 月下旬以来的最高水平后，再次快速逼近 10 万美元，整个金融市场重新点燃了投资者的风险偏好。【原文：Bitcoin is fast approaching $100,000 once again, after reaching its highest level since late February, with investors’ appetite for risk being rekindled across financial markets.】

item.title: 与嘉能可的潜在交易失败后，锂电池寻求买家
item.description: 在与嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）的潜在交易告吹后，一家加拿大电池回收初创企业正在寻找买家。【原文：A Canadian battery recycling startup is seeking buyers after a potential sale to Glencore Plc fell through.】

item.title: 光速公司是摆脱传统风险投资模式的最新公司
item.description: 光速创投（Lightspeed Venture Partners）是硅谷最大的风险投资公司之一，该公司已改变其监管地位，以扩大其投资范围；红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）、安德森-霍洛维茨公司（Andreessen Horowitz）和通用催化剂公司（General Catalyst）也采取了类似举措，摆脱了传统风险投资的玩法。【原文：Lightspeed Venture Partners, one of Silicon Valley’s largest venture capital firms, has changed its regulatory status to broaden its range of investments — following similar moves by Sequoia Capital, Andreessen Horowitz and General Catalyst as they shift away from the traditional VC playbook.】

item.title: 全食超市工会的胜利得到美国劳工委员会官员的支持
item.description: 全食超市（Whole Foods Market）试图推翻费城一家门店的工会投票，但被美国劳工委员会官员驳回，这是要求亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）旗下杂货连锁店首次与美国员工进行集体谈判的一步。【原文：Whole Foods Market’s effort to overturn a unionization vote at a Philadelphia store was rejected by a US labor board official, a step towards requiring Amazon.com Inc.’s grocery chain to collectively bargain with US employees for the first time.】

item.title: 首次公开募股候选公司 Kraken 称第一季度收入增长 19
item.description: Kraken 是历史最悠久的加密货币交易所之一，在数字资产市场波动加剧的情况下，该公司第一季度的收入和调整后盈利均有所增长。【原文：Kraken, one of the oldest crypto exchanges, saw revenue and adjusted earnings both rise in the first quarter while volatility in the digital-asset market increased.】

item.title: Third Point 称有望在动荡中提高信贷风险敞口
item.description: Third Point LLC 预计将在未来几周内提高公司债券的风险敞口，因为它希望利用关税相关波动带来的混乱。【原文：Third Point LLC expects to boost its exposure to company debt in the coming weeks, as it looks to capitalize on dislocations brought on by tariff-related volatility.】

item.title: BDT & MSD 的 Piekarski 成立房地产信贷公司 Derby Lane
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，BDT & MSD Partners 的校友 Adam Piekarski 正在重新开始，并成立了一家新的房地产信贷投资公司 Derby Lane Partners。【原文：BDT & MSD Partners alum Adam Piekarski is starting anew and has formed Derby Lane Partners, a new real estate credit investment firm, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Vanguard 的全球最大 ETF VOO 在四月份获得创纪录的资金流
item.description: 全球最大的交易所交易基金刚刚获得了最大的认可。【原文：The world’s biggest exchange-traded fund just got its biggest endorsement yet.】

item.title: 战神吸引 30 亿美元富豪投资者购买 PE 股权
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 为一家基金募集了 30 多亿美元，该基金允许富人以折扣价购买私募股权基金的股份，并按季度赎回投资。【原文：Ares Management Corp. raised more than $3 billion for a fund that allows wealthy individuals to buy discounted stakes in private equity funds and redeem their investments quarterly.】

item.title: 工厂数据刺激降息押注回落，美债下滑
item.description: 美国工厂活动数据好于预期，导致投资者略微降低了对美国今年降息的押注，国债随之下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped after better-than-feared data on US factory activity caused investors to slightly curb their bets on US interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 应对关税风险，庞巴迪重启指导计划
item.description: 庞巴迪公司（Bombardier Inc.）在上一季度暂停发布盈利指引后，本季度再次发布了2025年的盈利指引，因为这家喷气机制造商认为其多元化的收入足以帮助其渡过不确定的经济环境。【原文：Bombardier Inc. is offering earnings guidance for 2025 again after pausing last quarter, as the jet manufacturer sees its diversified revenue as strong enough to help it navigate through an uncertain economic environment.】

item.title: 尽管计划增产，欧佩克上月石油产量仍有所下降
item.description: 尽管欧佩克制定了期待已久的增产计划，但上个月该组织的原油产量仍有所下降，减产的主要原因是美国对委内瑞拉的制裁迫在眉睫。【原文：OPEC’s crude production fell last month despite the group’s long-awaited plans to increase, with much of the reduction stemming from looming US sanctions on Venezuela.】

item.title: 萨默斯称 "市场告诉美联储应该减产 "是错误的
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）说，债券市场的定价并不等同于对美联储应如何处理利率问题的判断，决策者下周放宽政策将是一个 "非常严重的错误"。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said that bond-market pricing doesn’t amount to a judgment call on what the Federal Reserve ought to do with interest rates, and that it would be a “very serious error” for policymakers to ease next week.】

item.title: 象牙海岸可可质量下降，可可供应困境加剧
item.description: 世界第一大可可生产国象牙海岸的可可研磨商正在为劣质可可豆而苦苦挣扎，因为从农场运来的可可豆中混入了大量废料，这给本已紧张的全球市场带来了更大的压力。【原文：Cocoa grinders in Ivory Coast, the world’s top producer, are struggling with poor-quality beans with unusually high levels of waste material mixed into deliveries arriving from farms, piling on pressure to an already tight global market.】

item.title: LinkedIn 在视频推广中与创作者分享广告收入
item.description: 由于视频内容增加了人们在网站上花费的时间，LinkedIn 将首次开始与创作者分享广告收入。【原文：LinkedIn will begin sharing advertising revenue with creators for the first time, as video content boosts the amount of time people spend on the site.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉恳求中国购买石油，特朗普将雪佛龙拒之门外
item.description: 委内瑞拉副总统德尔西-罗德里格斯（Delcy Rodríguez）上周访问北京时要求中国官员加大石油采购力度，因为委内瑞拉希望在美国下令雪佛龙公司和其他外国能源运营商下月撤出之前先发制人。【原文：Venezuelan Vice President Delcy Rodríguez asked Chinese officials to step up oil purchases during a visit to Beijing last week, as the nation seeks to preempt the US-ordered exit of Chevron Corp. and other foreign energy operators next month.】

item.title: Thrivent 出售与基金股权相关的 12 亿美元债务
item.description: 保险公司和资金管理公司 Thrivent 以其部分基金的现金流为支持发行了 12 亿美元的债务，这是今年结构性融资浪潮中的最新一笔，旨在为私人资本管理公司释放流动性。【原文：Insurer and money manager Thrivent issued $1.2 billion of debt backed by cash flows from some of its fund-of-funds, the latest in a wave of structured financings this year aimed at freeing up liquidity for private capital managers.】

item.title: 关税暴跌后，高收益债券创下 2023 年以来最差月度表现
item.description: 高收益市政债券创下了自 2023 年 9 月以来最差的一个月，因为这些证券正在努力挽回本月初关税引发的抛售所造成的损失。【原文：High-yield municipal bonds posted their worst month since September 2023 as the securities struggle to recoup losses from the tariff-fueled selloff earlier this month.】

item.title: 特朗普计划访问阿联酋，美国考虑放宽对阿联酋的英伟达芯片限制
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会在即将开始的海湾之行中宣布启动双边芯片交易。【原文：The US is weighing a potential easing of restrictions on Nvidia Corp. sales to the United Arab Emirates, according to people familiar with the matter, who said President Donald Trump could announce the start of work on a bilateral chip deal during his upcoming trip to the Gulf.】
